sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { FormGroup, FormControl, Validators } from '@angular/forms'; import { Usuario } from 'src/app/Models/Usuario'; @Component({ selector: 'app-new-usuario', templateUrl: './new-usuario.component.html', styleUrls: ['./new-usuario.component.css'] }) export class NewUsuarioComponent { usuarioData!: Usuario; usuarioForm!: FormGroup; constructor() { } ngOnInit(): void { this.usuarioForm = new FormGroup({ id: new FormControl(''), nome: new FormControl('', [Validators.required]), login: new FormControl('', [Validators.required]), email: new FormControl('', [Validators.required]), perfil: new FormControl('', [Validators.required]), senha: new FormControl('', [Validators.required]), }); } submit() { console.log("teste"); } }
